metadata.subject: Palloy, Pierre François, 1755-1835
Bastille
France. Assemblée nationale constituante (1789-1791)
Manuscripts, French
metadata.title: Époque de la glorieuse révolution francaise de 1789 dédié a un peuple libre, en faisant tenir à chaque chef lieux de départemens le modelle en relief de la Bastille en 1790
metadata.description: Describes models of the Bastille made from stones of the prison by Pierre François Palloy after he oversaw its demolition in 1789-1790 and gives a detailed explanation of an allegorical vignette featuring the Bastille, Louis XVI, and the marquis de Lafayette
Two poems in honor of the Assemblée nationale constituante and the French people, page 7-8
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title on cover page. Damaged, stained pages and cover.
